title: Personal Website
text: Wrote this website using Ruby on Rails

title: Iced Mocha
text: Collaborated with a peer to create iced-mocha.com, a website that allows you to aggregate RSS and social media feeds.
Written using Go, SQL, Haskell, Node.js, and React, and deployed with Docker Swarm.

title: Yahoo
text: Worked on a team of full time developers and interns creating a system to track usage of internal services.
Developed the core project with Go, integrating with legacy systems using Node.js.
Configured the production SQL database and wrote all database queries for the project.
Setup behavioral testing using Python.

title: BlankBook
text: Created an Android app that allows you to create and post to chat groups anonymously.
Wrote the backend in Go and SQL, deployed using Docker Swarm on Amazon EC2.

title: OpenWindow
text: Used the MEAN stack to write a distributed location-based site allowing you to create and view posts from your region with automatic backup and failover.

title: TribalScale
text: Pair programmed with experienced developers, working in Java and JavaScript (Node.js + React).
Worked on projects for various clients, including and Android app and a companies new website.
Added features to an Android app for a startup, including a video messaging feature.
Worked with developers at TribalScale and the client company when developing a new website for a large client.
Added new content, a home page animation, and integration with a CMS to the TribalScale website.

title: Crossword Solver
text: Created a Python program to produce all possible crossword puzzle solutions based on a word bank.

title: Mastermind Solver
text: Made a C program to break codes using the rules of the Mastermind game.

title: Portable Planner
text: Wrote an Android that allows you to write notes and create reminders for your classes.

title: Rave
text: Developed the Rave video/chat app for Android.

title: My Math Class
text: Wrote a simple Android app to generate math quizzes at various difficulties.
